sentence.Network_en: He's one of the most dynamically imaginative jazz pianists still functioning.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是当下仍旧活跃的最有闯劲、最具想象力的爵士乐钢琴师之一。

encyclopedia.content: 爵士乐源于蓝音，是一种从前居住在美国南部的非洲奴隶以及他们的后代们的民间音乐。蓝调深受西非文化和音乐传统的影响，这些奴隶也逐渐成为移居到城市的黑人的音乐家。爵士乐是爵士舞起源的重要原动力，但现代爵士舞也受到古典音乐、摇滚乐、迪斯可和hip hop的影响，发展...

entry.def: Jazz is a style of music that was invented by African American musicians in the early part of the twentieth century. Jazz music has very strong rhythms and often involves improvisation.

example.ex: The pub has live jazz on Sundays.
example.tran: 那家酒馆每周日都有现场爵士乐演奏。

example.ex: ...the great American jazz pianist George Shearing.
example.tran: 美国伟大的爵士乐钢琴演奏家乔治·希林

means.word_mean: 2. a genre of popular music that originated in New Orleans around 1900 and developed through increasingly complex styles
